solution_line_template: Each day she eats a total of {breakfast_jerky} + {lunch_jerky} + {dinner_jerky} = <<{breakfast_jerky}+{lunch_jerky}+{dinner_jerky}={daily_jerky_consumption}>>{daily_jerky_consumption} pieces of jerky.

For the entire trip, she will consume a total of {daily_jerky_consumption} * {trip_duration_days} = <<{daily_jerky_consumption}*{trip_duration_days}={total_jerky_consumed}>>{total_jerky_consumed} pieces of jerky.

She gives half to her brother, which will leave her a total of {total_jerky_consumed} / {brother_share_divisor} = <<{total_jerky_consumed}/{brother_share_divisor}={jerky_left_after_sharing}>>{jerky_left_after_sharing} pieces of jerky.
